reuters.title: SWISS SIGHT DEPOSITS RISE 743.7 MLN FRANCS
reuters.body: Sight deposits of commercial banks at the Swiss National Bank rose 743.7 mln Swiss francs in the second 10 days of March to 8.40 billion, the National Bank said. Foreign exchange reserves fell 392.1 mln francs to 33.55 billion. Sight deposits are a major indicator of money market liquidity in Switzerland. REUTER 
